Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Initial Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and Duke O'Dowd, sets up the initial conflict with suspicious followers, and transitions into the superhero's first action confronting 'cop shooters' and getting involved in a new conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the comic, the Human Meteor, and Duke's taxi driving life, setting the stage with an underwater threat and a suspicious G-Man following Duke.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers
The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Cop Shooters and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts and defeats 'cop shooters', deals with the aftermath, and is then approached with a new mission related to a 'Jap sub' conspiracy while in the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration Plan and Stowaway
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans with Toby to infiltrate the suspicious yacht to investigate the 'Jap sub' conspiracy, leading to Toby successfully sneaking aboard but quickly being discovered.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Underwater Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the yacht 'Marlin' and the unfolding conspiracy. It covers activities on the yacht, Toby's capture, Pete's discovery of the depth chart and the submarine plot, leading to Toby being thrown overboard and Human Meteor's underwater intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck and Cabin Activities
sub_scenes.description: Establishes the scene on the yacht 'Marlin' with crew activities and Pete's examination of a depth chart, hinting at hidden agendas.

sub_scenes.title: Toby Overboard and Duke's Premonition
sub_scenes.description: Toby is thrown overboard, Duke senses something wrong, and the yacht crew confirms the submarine plot and decides to contact Duke.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives underwater, discovers the sunken submarine, encounters divers, and observes the submarine crew preparing torpedoes, revealing the underwater operation.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Fight and Namor's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Divers confront and attack Human Meteor, the submarine attempts escape, and Namor intervenes, attacking both the submarine and the yacht to disrupt the conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor
Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap
Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Aftermath and Treachery Unveiled
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with the aftermath of the underwater attack. Duke escapes to the yacht, discovers Peter's death and finds the depth map, which reveals Peter's treachery. This leads to a speedboat chase and a hospital visit to Holden, concluding with Duke returning home after a long day.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Yacht Arrival and Depth Map Search
sub_scenes.description: Duke escapes and arrives at the yacht, learns of Peter's death, and begins searching Peter's cabin for the depth map.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Speedboat Chase and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby engage in a speedboat chase, visit a recovering Holden in the hospital, and begin to wind down after the day's events.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline, introducing the Liberty Lads in a war scenario and then transitioning to a street scene with an ambulance arriving and boys observing, setting up a new mystery unrelated to Human Meteor.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads in Action
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the Liberty Lads engaged in combat against 'Nazi fiends', establishing a war-time action scene.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Man
sub_scenes.description: Shifts focus to two boys observing an ambulance arriving at a house and an injured man being carried inside, setting up a new, localized mystery.

Major_Arcs.title: The Wallet, Major Bronson, and Bus Garage Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the dropped wallet incident, the boys' decision to return it, their encounter with a Marine saluting Major Bronson in disguise, leading them to a bus garage and into a dangerous conspiracy involving 'Mr. Horst'.

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet leading them to a bus company garage, initiating a chain of events.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase
Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised

sub_scenes.title: Garage Reception and Mr. Horst's Threat
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the garage, are led inside, and encounter the menacing Mr. Horst, revealing a dangerous situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Bronson's Deadly Plan
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys while Major Bronson plots against them, escalating the danger to a life-threatening situation.

sub_scenes.title: Garage Uprising and Bronson's Violence
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out in the garage, Mr. Horst threatens the boys further, and Major Bronson violently intervenes, shooting someone and taking control.

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Barracks and Sabotage Plot Uncovered
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Skip and Chuck's escape and split paths. Chuck seeks help while Skip uncovers a sabotage plot in a secret office, leading to an attack on the Marine Barracks and a confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Secret Office Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Skip and Chuck split up to seek help, with Chuck meeting a Marine Sergeant and Skip discovering a secret office containing sabotage plans.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Office Fight
sub_scenes.description: The Marine Barracks is attacked, leading to a chaotic office fight where Skip defends himself and enemies are confronted.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Arrival and Major's Injury Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive and engage in combat, discovering the Major is injured and requiring immediate medical attention, followed by a scene of victory and recovery.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Rosita Kidnapping Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry, involved in a mission against 'Hitler tools', and shifts to a South American town where they are confronted about the kidnapping of President's daughter, Rosita, leading to interrogation and the reveal of El Tigre's involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and South American Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduces The Champ and Henry's mission against 'Hitler tools' and their arrival in a South American town where they face suspicion.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: Detention and Rosita Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Americans are detained and interrogated, and the reason for their suspicion is revealed: the kidnapping of Rosita by El Tigre.

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre and Rosita Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the El Tigre storyline, starting with whispers about him, a forced car journey, leading to a misunderstanding with 'Mama', and then shifting to a rescue mission for Rosita after learning she's been kidnapped by Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Encounter with 'Mama'
sub_scenes.description: Rumors of El Tigre and gasoline demands, followed by a forced car ride and a surprising encounter with 'Mama' who believes the men are helping rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Entering El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Men plan to approach El Tigre's hideout cautiously due to police agents, and then proceed to infiltrate under the cover of darkness.

sub_scenes.title: Diversion, El Tigre's Reveal, and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: A diversion tactic is used with stage dollars, El Tigre is revealed, followed by interrogation and forceful actions against individuals within the hideout.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Rescue Plan and Horseback Ride
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita being held by Axis agents reaches El Tigre, prompting him to shift from denial to action, initiating a rescue mission on horseback.

narrative_arcs.title: News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Hotel and Citadel Action - Rosita's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers multiple simultaneous actions: El Tigre's horseback assault, hotel infiltration by another group, escape towards a citadel, gymnastic entry, and finally, the successful rescue of Rosita, amidst ongoing hotel fighting.

sub_scenes.title: Horseback Assault and Hotel Infiltration Planning
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre and his men continue their horseback assault while another group plans to infiltrate a hotel.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Assault, Citadel Escape, and Gymnastic Entry
sub_scenes.description: The hotel infiltration commences with force, while other characters escape towards a citadel and use gymnastics to overcome barriers.

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Hotel Fight Continuation
sub_scenes.description: Rosita is found and rescued amidst ongoing fighting within the hotel.

Major_Arcs.title: Hotel Battle Climax and Government Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the climax of the hotel battle with displays of dominance and violence, Rosita's warning, escalating threats, and the arrival of government troops, signaling a shift in power and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Fight Escalation and Machine Gun Threat
sub_scenes.description: The hotel fight intensifies with displays of dominance, a warning from Rosita, brutal attacks, and the introduction of a machine gun threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

sub_scenes.title: Government Alliance and Rescue Gratitude
sub_scenes.description: Reveals a government alliance and recognition, followed by gratitude expressed for a rescue.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Devil Dog Dolan's separate jungle mission, starting with combat, military reporting, and the revelation of a disobeyed order and a bargain, leading to his jungle arrival, ambush, and capture.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Military Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat, followed by a military report discussing a 'grave matter' involving him and Captain Lawton.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival, Danger, and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle, senses danger, and is ambushed and captured by natives.

Major_Arcs.title: Captivity and Moral Justifications
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Dolan's captivity and interrogation, revealing torture, justifications for violence, and orders amidst burning huts, culminating in Dolan's vengeful declaration.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity and Torture
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured and brought before Grauer, facing interrogation and torture threats.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Actions and Grim Flashback
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions, leading to a flashback of Sam burning and Dolan's cold justification for it.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification

sub_scenes.title: Burning Huts and Vengeful Declaration
sub_scenes.description: Grauer issues orders amidst burning huts, and Dolan expresses satisfaction with the destruction and vows revenge for Sam's death.

narrative_arcs.title: Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

Major_Arcs.title: Jungle Revenge and Alliance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Dolan's vengeful actions in the jungle, leading to an ambush and fight where the chief dies. This results in an unexpected alliance with the natives who were oppressed by the chief, shifting from conflict to cooperation.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Chief's Death
sub_scenes.description: Dolan and another man ambush natives in the jungle, leading to a fight where the chief accidentally dies.

sub_scenes.title: Native Homage and Alliance Formation
sub_scenes.description: Natives show homage after the chief's death, leading to a conversation revealing their oppression and a potential alliance with Dolan and America.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma, Sam's Fight, and Dolan's Spanking
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts back to the ship, showing the Captain's dilemma about surrendering to Grauer, his son Sam's fight, and Dolan's disciplinary spanking for disobeying orders, highlighting themes of duty and sacrifice.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Sam's Unexpected Fight
sub_scenes.description: The Captain contemplates surrendering but is interrupted by discovering his son Sam in a fight.

sub_scenes.title: Disciplinary Action and Service Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Dolan receives a disciplinary spanking from the Captain but acknowledges the lesson about service over self.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Twinkle Twins investigating a murder. It starts with a street confrontation, transitions to a news office assignment, and then follows their investigation to a police station and hospital, culminating in meeting a sick girl and uncovering a blood transfusion plot.

sub_scenes.title: City Street Confrontation and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the Twinkle Twins reacting to a street confrontation and then being assigned a murder case at their news office.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins

sub_scenes.title: Evidence, Police Inquiry, and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Details evidence against a suspect, shifts to a police station inquiry about Guy Reilly, and transitions to a hospital visit to find 'Reilly's sick kid'.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly
Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion Plot and Candy Store Phone Call
sub_scenes.description: Hospital staff reveals Miss Reilly's blood transfusion need and Farnacci's unique blood type, leading Dan and Diane to investigate Farnacci and call Elijah from a candy store.

narrative_arcs.title: Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion
Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown

sub_scenes.title: Radio Broadcast and Irish Section Search Plan
sub_scenes.description: A radio broadcast reveals Farnacci's gang connection and banker's threat, leading Dan and Diane to plan a search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section.

narrative_arcs.title: Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat
Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section

Major_Arcs.title: Irish Section Search, Mrs. Murphy's Revelation, and Ambush
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dan and Diane's search in the Irish section, their encounter with Mrs. Murphy who reveals Tom Reilly's sacrifice, leading to a sudden violent ambush outside Mrs. Murphy's house.

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's House
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane search the Irish section for Tom Reilly, encountering locals and being invited into Mrs. Murphy's house.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: As Dan and Diane are inside Mrs. Murphy's house, a violent taxi ambush occurs outside, witnessed by Dan who immediately pursues the shooters.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

Major_Arcs.title: Hospital Aftermath and Blood Transfusion Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the aftermath of the street brawl, the transport of the injured to the hospital, the dire news about Tom Reilly's condition and need for blood, leading to a community appeal and successful blood transfusion.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Transport and Dire News
sub_scenes.description: Injured individuals are transported to the hospital, and Dan and Diane receive dire news about Tom Reilly's critical condition and need for blood.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal

sub_scenes.title: Community Blood Donation and Reilly's Revival
sub_scenes.description: An urgent call for blood donors is made, the community responds, a blood match is found, and Tom Reilly receives a life-saving transfusion and revives.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

Major_Arcs.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Lassie's Recovery Celebration
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the murder mystery storyline, focusing on public outcry against Farnacci, police action leading to his impending arrest, and finally, a celebratory birthday party for Lassie Reilly's recovery, bringing closure to the narrative.

sub_scenes.title: Public Outcry and Police Action Plan
sub_scenes.description: Public anger demands action against Farnacci, leading Dan and Diane to plan police intervention and media coverage.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest

sub_scenes.title: Lassie's Recovery and Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Concludes with a happy ending at Lassie Reilly's birthday party, celebrating her recovery and hinting at future adventures for the Twinkle Twins.

narrative_arcs.title: Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
